\ubc1c\uc0dd\uc2dc\ud0a8\ub2e4..\r","params":{"_gameHex":"\uae30\uc874 \uac8c\uc784 \ub85c\uadf8\uc640\uc758 \ube44\uad50\ub97c \ud1b5\ud574 \uc870\uc791 \uc5ec\ubd80\ub97c \ud1a0\ud070\uc744 Magnet \ud1a0\ud070\uc73c\ub85c \uad50\ud658\uc2dc\ucf1c\uc8fc\ub3c4\ub85d \uc694\uccad\ud55c\ub2e4.\r","return":"\uc815\uc0c1\uc801\uc73c\ub85c transaction\uc774 \ubcf4\uc5ec\uc900\ub2e4.\r     Solidity \ud2b9\uc131 \uc0c1 mapping\uc744 \uc804\uccb4 \uc21c\ud68c\ud560 \uc218 \uc5c6\uae30\ub54c\ubb38\uc5d0 index\ub97c \ud65c\uc6a9\ud55c\ub2e4.\r     for loop\ub294 front-end\uc5d0\uc11c \ub3cc\uba74\uc11c \ud655\uc778\ud560 \uc218 \uc788\ub3c4\ub85d \ud55c\ub2e4.\r     getTotalGameCount()\ub97c \uc774\uc6a9\ud574 front-end\uc5d0\uc11c \ucd5c\uadfc \uac8c\uc784\ubc88\ud638\ub97c \uc800\uc7a5\ud55c\ub4a4 \uc774\ub97c \ud65c\uc6a9\ud574 for loop\ub97c \ub3c8\ub2e4\uba74\r     \ud655\uc778\uc774 \uac00\ub2a5\ud558\ub2e4.\r","params":{"index":"\uc54c\uace0\uc2f6\uc740 \uac8c\uc784\ubc88\ud638\r"},"return":"\ucd5c\uadfc \uac8c\uc784\uc758 \ub09c\uc774\ub3c4\uc640\ub97c \ubc18\ud658\ud55c\ub2e4.\r"},"startGame(bytes2,uint8,bytes32,bool[3])":{"details":"\uac8c\uc784 \uc2dc\uc791 \uc2dc \uc2e4\ud589\ub418\ub294 \ud568\uc218\ub85c\uc368 \uc720\uc800\uc815\ubcf4 account address\r uint256 totalGameCount;  // to tracking recent GameResult.\r mapping (uint256 => GameResult) results; // start from 0 to N.... (game result log)\r bool isPlaying;\r bool isExistUser;\r \r      *\r truct GameResult { // use for game log!\r bytes32 gameHex; // use for transparency. (when start the game, )\r bytes2 difficulty; // EZ, NM, HD - necessary?\r bool isWinner; //default : false ***true: win the game, false: lose the game\r bool useItem; //default: false\r \r","params":{"_difficulty":"\uac8c\uc784\uc758 \ub09c\uc774\ub3c4\ub97c front-end\uc5d0\uc11c \ubc1b\uc544\uc628\ub2e4.\r","_gameCost":"\uac8c\uc784 \uc2dc\uc791\uc5d0 \uc0ac\uc6a9\ud55c Magnet \ud1a0\ud070 \uc591\uc744 front-end\uc5d0\uc11c \ubc1b\uc544\uc628\ub2e4.\r","_gameHex":"\uac8c\uc784\uc758 transparency\ub97c \uc704\ud55c sha256 value\ub97c front-end\uc5d0\uc11c \ubc1b\uc544\uc628\ub2e4.\r"}},"useItems(bool[3])":{"details":"\uac8c\uc784 \uc2dc\uc791 \uc804 \uc544\uc774\ud15c \uc0ac\uc6a9 \uc5ec\ubd80\uc5d0 \ub530\ub77c MagnetField \ud1a0\ud070\uc744 \uac10\uc18c\uc2dc\ud0a8\ub2e4.\r","params":{"_useItems":"\uac01 \uc544\uc774\ud15c\uc5d0 \ub300\ud55c \uc120\ud0dd \uc5ec\ubd80 \uc815\ubcf4\ub97c \uac00\uc9c4 parameter\r"},"return":"\uc815\uc0c1\uc801\uc73c\ub85c \uc218\ud589\ub41c \uacbd\uc6b0 true\uac12\uc744 endGame(bytes32,bool).details: 게임 종료 시 실행되는 함수로써 게임 결과를 업데이트 한 후 LOSE 이벤트를 발생시킨다..

params._gameHex: 기존 게임 로그와의 비교를 통해 조작 여부를 확인한다.
params._isWinner: 게임 승리 여부를 확인하기 위한 bool parameter

exchangeTokens(uint256).details: MagnetField 토큰을 Magnet 토큰으로 교환시켜주도록 요청한다.
exchangeTokens(uint256).return: 정상적으로 transaction이 이루어진 경우 true를 반환한다.

getGameResults(uint256).details: 유저의 특정(index) 게임 결과를 보여준다.     Solidity 특성 상 mapping을 전체 순회할 수 없기때문에 index를 활용한다.     for loop는 front-end에서 돌면서 확인할 수 있도록 한다.     getTotalGameCount()를 이용해 front-end에서 최근 게임번호를 저장한뒤 이를 활용해 for loop를 돈다면     확인이 가능하다.

startGame(bytes2,uint8,bytes32,bool[3]).details: 게임 시작 시 실행되는 함수로써 유저정보 최신화 및 게임로그 기록을 한 후 START 이벤트를 발생시킨다. truct UserInfo { address payable gamerID; // User account address uint256 totalGameCount;  // to tracking recent GameResult. mapping (uint256 => GameResult) results; // start from 0 to N.... (game result log) bool isPlaying; bool isExistUser;       * truct GameResult { // use for game log! bytes32 gameHex; // use for transparency. (when start the game, ) bytes2 difficulty; // EZ, NM, HD - necessary? bool isWinner; //default : false ***true: win the game, false: lose the game bool useItem; //default: false

params._gameCost: 게임 시작에 사용한 Magnet 토큰 양을 front-end에서 받아온다.
params._gameHex: 게임의 transparency를 위한 sha256 value를 front-end에서 받아온다.

useItems(bool[3]).details: 게임 시작 전 아이템 사용 여부에 따라 MagnetField 토큰을 감소시킨다.

params._useItems: 각 아이템에 대한 선택 여부 정보를 가진 parameter
